participant_1.background:
I plan to go to business school next year.
My parents are very wealthy bankers.
I grew up in manhattan.
I graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance.

participant_2.background:
I am a male.
I own a house in florida.
I have a children and a dogs.
I enjoy american sports.
I work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years.

content.text: I'm looking forward to going to business school next year.
That's great! What school are you going to?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about Wharton or Harvard.
Those are both great schools. I'm sure you'll get into one of them.
Thanks! I hope so.
What do you want to do with your business degree?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm interested in working in investment banking.
That's a great field. I know a few people who work in investment banking, and they all love it.
That's good to hear. I'm excited to learn more about it.
What do you know about investment banking?
Not much, but I know it's a field where you work with companies to raise money for new projects or acquisitions.
That's a good start. Investment banking is a lot more than just that, but that's the basic idea.
That's interesting. I'm looking forward to learning more about it.
You'll definitely learn a lot in business school. It's a challenging but rewarding program.
I'm up for the challenge. I'm excited to get started.
I'm sure you'll do great. You seem like a smart and motivated person.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
No problem. I'm always happy to talk to people about business. It's one of my passions.
I can tell. You seem to know a lot about it.
I like to think so. I've been working in the field for a while now, so I've picked up a thing or two.
That's awesome. I'm sure you'll have a lot to teach me in business school.
I hope so. I'm always happy to help someone learn.
Thanks. I appreciate that.
